about_the_game:
Finally, a tower defense game from popular distributor Kiri Komayama is now available!

Join Kiri Komayama, a V-streamer with fox ears and glasses, in defending the observatory from the cat-shaped enemy [NEKO]!
Strengthen your avatar and build a powerful defense network.
What is the true identity of the threatening entity [NEKO]?
Will you be able to protect Koma Yama Kiri?

Game Features:

Defend My Koma-yama" is an orthodox tower defense game.
Place towers and defeat enemies that come after your HQ.
Costs required for tower placement and upgrades are obtained by defeating enemies.
You win by defending your HQ until the last enemy is defeated.

Play time

.30~60 minutes

Video Distribution Guidelines

.No permission from the publisher is required to distribute or post videos.
We will make it possible to distribute this game and monetize the video through any means, including distribution platforms and throwaway functions.
We would appreciate it if you could include the name of the game in the title of your video or distribution, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section.
The publisher is not responsible for any damage caused by distributing or posting videos of this game.

In the event of a problem with the interpretation of the guidelines, the Japanese description will be considered the correct one.
The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.
